data: OB MFM Complex Monochorionic Twins - Post Operative

These orders pertain to patient staying in High Acuity Unit for 24 hours post operative. When transferring out of High Acuity Unit, ensure transfer reconciliation is performed and utilize OB Antepartum Admission
Discontinue OB MFM Complex Monochorionic Twins – Pre Operative / Admission PowerPlan
Patient to stay in High Acuity Unit for 24 hours
continuous for 12 hours, for uterine activity only
continuous for 12 hours, for fetal heart rate and uterine activity
q1h, Monitor output via indwelling urinary catheter until the next morning
Start: Clear Fluid Diet, Adjust/Advance Diet to: Other(please specify), Maternity/Lactation Diet
Start: Clear Fluid Diet, Adjust/Advance Diet to: Diabetes Diet, Maternity diet
order rate: 80 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
100 mg, rectal, q12h interval, order duration: 2 doses or times, drug form: supp
1 patch, topical, as directed, order duration: 1 doses or times, administer over: 12 hour, drug form: patch
dose range: 650 to 975 mg, PO, q6h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 650 to 975 mg, rectal, q6h, PRN pain, drug form: supp
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain-severe, drug form: tab
If patient is Rh negative and fetus Rh status is positive or unknown, select TM Rh Immune Globulin (RhIG/ WinRho) (Module)
Bloodwork to be done at 6 hours post-op
